Summary: plane-like shape similar to space shuttle with bright square white lights along side, similar to windows on a plane, triangular bottom
divs: Sighting DetailsOn my way home on March 15 (2009), I spotted what I thought was an aircraft lining up for approach for landing at your airport between 8-8:30pm. The aircraft and I were heading in opposite directions - I was heading west on route 22 away from the airport, while the aircraft was heading east toward the airport. As I got closer toward the object, it appeared the object was moving very slowly since it seemed to be taking quite some time to get to the airport. However, as I got closer to the route 309 interchange, I noticed the aircraft was hovering without sound, roughly 200 feet up and within 100 yards west of route 309 north exit near route 22. It was definitely not a helicopter. Were there any other reports regarding this strange object?
